explains: v. 加剧，增强；增强（底片）的阻光度，增加（底片）的厚度

sentences.en: Failure can never defeat me but only intensify my desire to succeed.
sentences.cn: 失败永远无法打败我，只会增强我对获得成功的渴望。

sentences.en: That is clearly an untenable view, since editors can often intensify reader interest in a news topic by giving it frequent coverage.
sentences.cn: 这显然是站不住脚的观点，因为编辑通常可以通过频繁报道来增强读者对新闻话题的兴趣。

sentences.en: "We are starting to see much more clearly where the effects of climate change on agriculture could intensify hunger and poverty," said research leader Patti Kristjanson.
sentences.cn: “我们开始更加清楚地看到气候变化对农业的影响可能会加剧饥饿和贫困。”研究负责人 Patti Kristjanson 说。
